context: Domo, Inc. is a cloud-based business intelligence platform focused on data visualization, analytics, and business intelligence for enterprises. Business cloud platform. Data apps and AI integration.

competitors.name: Notion
competitors.notes: Market share leader in Business Intelligence category with 23.71%, significantly ahead of Domo's 0.60%.

competitors.name: Microsoft Power BI
competitors.notes: Second by market share at 14.42%. Ideal for businesses using Microsoft products. Deep integrations with Excel, Azure, and other Microsoft services.

competitors.name: Tableau
competitors.notes: Third by market share at 13.36%. Salesforce-owned BI platform. Known for rich data visualization and interactive drag-and-drop interface. Customizable reports, real-time analysis.

competitors.name: Zoho Analytics
competitors.notes: Comprehensive BI solution with AI-powered assistant Zia for automated insights, trends, data-driven decisions. 500+ native data connectors. Clear transparent pricing starting at $8/user/month.

competitors.name: Qlik Sense
competitors.notes: Independent data analysis for enterprises with AI, NLP, automation. Shining feature: associative engine linking related data sets to uncover meaningful insights.

competitors.name: Amazon QuickSight
competitors.notes: BI tool for visualizing and analyzing data with interactive dashboards and ML-driven insights. Strong integration with AWS products (Redshift, S3). ML-powered insights and natural language querying.

competitors.name: ThoughtSpot
competitors.notes: Search-driven platform enabling natural language questions for instant insights. Combines AI-powered analytics with user-friendly dashboards. Makes data accessible to everyone.

competitors.name: Luzmo
competitors.notes: Excels at embedded dashboards for self-service analytics. Build advanced analytics dashboards for your product. Powerful API to connect to data stack for real-time analysis.

competitors.name: Looker
competitors.notes: Google Cloud's business intelligence and data analytics platform.

competitors.name: Sisense
competitors.notes: AI-driven analytics platform for embedding analytics.
